text: "'On Again Tonight" is a song recorded by American country music artist Trent Willmon. It was released in February 2006 as the first single from the album A Little More Livin. The song reached #27 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart. The song was written by Marv Green, Phillip White and Jimmy Melton. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (2006) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2006 singles Category:2006 songs Category:Trent Willmon songs Category:Songs written by Marv Green Category:Song recordings produced by Frank Rogers (record producer) Category:Columbia Records singles
title: On Again Tonight
